movies.title: Don Camillo en Russie
movies.plot: The village of mayor Peppone and Don Camillo, after much dispute, gets a assigned a sister village in Russia. When Peppone and his comrades decide to attend the ceremony on the other side of the iron curtain, Don Camillo wants to join. Peppone is strictly against this but after Don Camillo threatens him to disclose information about an earlier side step the mayor agrees. Don Camillo arranges for false papers: He is now comrade Tarocci. Only Peppone and the other villagers know who he really is. In Russia the agenda includes various cultural events: Ballet, Opera, a fishing competition and various parties...
movies.simplePlot: The village of mayor Peppone and Don Camillo, after much dispute, gets a assigned a sister village in Russia. When Peppone and his comrades decide to attend the ceremony on the other side ...

biography.bio: The apocryphal biography of Fernand Contadin tells the invention of his artistic name Fernandel by his sister-in-law ("Voici le Fernand d'elles"). At the beginning of the thirties he became a typical actor of the comedy genre: popular, common, likable and with a concealed grain of drama. Marc Allégret was the director of his first successful film La meilleure bobonne (1930). He tried to work as director twice during World War II but did not succeed in that.
biography.name: Fernandel

biography.bio: The son of Italian theatre critic Antonio Cervi, Gino Cervi was one of the most famous Italian actors, first on stage, then on screen and finally on television. He appeared in his first play in 1924, a year after his father's death. He won world fame with three movies directed by Alessandro Blasetti: Aldebaran (1936), Ettore Fieramosca (1938), and An Adventure of Salvator Rosa (1939). After the WWII, his film career flourished, and then on television, he found new fame as Inspector Jules Maigret in a series of TV Movies based on the novels of Georges Simenon.
biography.name: Gino Cervi

biography.bio: Leda Gloria was born on August 30, 1908 in Rome, Lazio, Italy as Leda Nicoletti. She was an actress, known for Don Camillo en Russie (1965), Don Camillo... Monseigneur! (1961) and The Little World of Don Camillo (1952). She died on March 16, 1997 in Rome.
biography.name: Leda Gloria

biography.bio: Gianni Garko was born on July 15, 1935 in Zara, Dalmatia, Italy as Giovanni Garcovich. He is an actor, known for Waterloo (1970), If You Meet Sartana Pray for Your Death (1968) and Kapò (1960).
biography.name: Gianni Garko

biography.bio: Saro Urzì was born on February 24, 1913 in Catania, Italy as Rosario Urzì. He was an actor, known for The Godfather (1972), Séduite et abandonnée (1964) and Beat the Devil (1953). He died on November 2, 1979 in San Giuseppe Vesuviano, Italy.
biography.name: Saro Urzì

biography.bio: Graziella Granata was born on March 13, 1941 in Rome, Lazio, Italy. She is an actress, known for Soldier's Girl (1967), Curse of the Blood Ghouls (1964) and White Voices (1964).
biography.name: Graziella Granata

biography.bio: Paul Muller was born on March 11, 1923 in Neuchâtel, Neuchâtel, Switzerland as Paul Konrad Muller. He is an actor, known for Journey to Italy (1954), Nightmare Castle (1965) and Vampiros Lesbos (1971).
biography.name: Paul Muller

biography.bio: Marco Tulli was born on November 20, 1920 in Rome, Lazio, Italy. He was an actor, known for Beat the Devil (1953), It Started in Naples (1960) and The Little World of Don Camillo (1952). He died on March 20, 1982 in Rome.
biography.name: Marco Tulli

biography.bio: Jacques Herlin was born on August 17, 1927 in France as Jacques De Jouette. He was an actor, known for Des hommes et des dieux (2010), A Good Year (2006) and National Lampoon's European Vacation (1985). He died on June 7, 2014 in Paris, Ile-de-France, France.
biography.name: Jacques Herlin

biography.bio: Silla Bettini was born on February 28, 1923 in Rome, Lazio, Italy. He was an actor and assistant director, known for L'incompris (1967), The Facts of Murder (1959) and Don Camillo en Russie (1965). He died on May 15, 2003 in Rome.
biography.name: Silla Bettini

biography.bio: Aldo Vasco is an actor, known for Buffalo Bill in Rome (1949), Don Camillo en Russie (1965) and Pride and Vengeance (1967).
biography.name: Aldo Vasco

biography.bio: Alessandro Gottlieb was born on February 12, 1904 in Sighet, Transylvania, Romania. He was an actor, known for Don Camillo en Russie (1965) and Death at Owell Rock (1967). He died in 1973 in Rome, Lazio, Italy.
biography.name: Alessandro Gottlieb

biography.bio: Mirko Valentin is an actor, known for Castle of the Living Dead (1964), Don Camillo en Russie (1965) and The Rover (1967).
biography.name: Mirko Valentin

biography.bio: Ettore Geri was born on March 15, 1914 in Trieste, Austria-Hungary. He is known for his work on Titus (1999), The Garden of the Finzi-Continis (1970) and The Boom (1963). He died on February 19, 2003 in Rome, Lazio, Italy.
biography.name: Ettore Geri

biography.bio: Margherita Sala is an actress, known for La rose rouge (1973), Don Camillo en Russie (1965) and Un amour interdit (1984).
biography.name: Margherita Sala
